text: (ai rasool) tum kaho ki mai to jo (quraan) mere paas vahee ke taur par aaya hai usamen koee cheez kisee khaane vaale par jo usako khae haraam nahin paata magar jabaki vah murda ya bahata hua khî€¼oon ya sooar ka gosht ho to beshak ye (cheeje) naapaak aur haraam hain ya (vah jaanavar) naapharamaanee ka baes ho ki (vakte zibaha) khuda ke siva kisee aur ka naam liya gaya ho phir jo shakhs (har tarah) bebas ho jae (aur) naapharamaan va sarakash na ho aur is haalat mein khae to alabatta tumhaara paravaradigaar bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
